name: SVGPathElement.getTotalLength
description: The SVGPathElement.getTotalLength() method returns the user agent's computed value for the total length of the path in user units.

refs.name: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 1.1 (Second Edition)
refs.description: The definition of 'SVGPathElement.getTotalLength()' in the 'Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 1.1 (Second Edition)' specification.
